title: builder: fatal: destination path 'go.tools.TMP' already exists and is not an empty directory.
body:
The Windows builder has been seen failing with:

```
fatal: destination path 'go.tools.TMP' already exists and is not an empty directory.
```

in e.g. http://build.golang.org/log/56ef938f142bad19e56ef8c78620877baa3baf90

Should fix.
